turns.content: Yes, I am familiar with YSL. YSL is an abbreviation for Yves Saint Laurent, a French fashion house founded by Yves Saint Laurent and his partner, Pierre Bergé. Yves Saint Laurent was a French fashion designer who was widely regarded as one of the greatest designers in the history of fashion. He was known for his innovative and influential designs, and his fashion house was one of the most successful and respected in the industry.

Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) is a luxury fashion brand that offers a wide range of products, including women's and men's clothing, shoes, handbags, small leather goods, and accessories. The brand is known for its high-quality, stylish, and sophisticated designs, and its products are sold in department stores and boutiques around the world. Some of the most popular YSL products include the brand's iconic handbags, such as the "Muse" and "Saint Laurent Paris" bags, as well as its shoes, such as the "Tribute" and "Paloma" sandals. YSL also offers a range of beauty and fragrance products, including perfumes, skincare, and makeup.

Yes, Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) offers a range of cosmetics products, including foundation, concealer, powder, blush, bronzer, eyeshadow, mascara, eyeliner, brow products, lipstick, and lip gloss. YSL cosmetics are known for their high-quality ingredients, innovative formulas, and stylish packaging, and the brand is popular among makeup artists and beauty enthusiasts around the world. YSL cosmetics are available at department stores, specialty beauty retailers, and on the brand's website. In addition to makeup, YSL also offers skincare and fragrance products.
Is YSL still an independent brand? or its acquired?

Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) is not currently an independent brand. In 1999, the fashion house was acquired by the luxury goods group Kering, formerly known as PPR. Kering is a multinational company based in France that owns a portfolio of luxury brands, including Alexander McQueen, Balenciaga, Brioni, Gucci, and Saint Laurent. YSL remains a distinct brand within the Kering portfolio and is known for its high-quality, stylish, and sophisticated fashion and beauty products.
